amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 107 of the bill that provides for the establishment of an over-the-road bus security assistance grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-74 to strike the section of the bill that provides a new Homeland Security grant program, `Over-The-Road Bus Security Assistance.'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 332 (Roll no. 197).
